codeExamples.title: Numeric
codeExamples.code:
// Integer types
var i int = 42
var u uint = 42
var i8 int8 = 127
var i16 int16 = 32767
var i32 int32 = 2147483647
var i64 int64 = 9223372036854775807

// Float types
var f32 float32 = 3.14
var f64 float64 = 3.14159265359

codeExamples.title: String
Boolean
codeExamples.code:
// Boolean values
var isTrue bool = true
var isFalse bool = false

// Boolean operations
result := isTrue && isFalse  // false
result = isTrue || isFalse   // true
result = !isTrue             // false
